text.div:
Remove Members from Attribution Roster

OPERATION: Remove Members from Attribution Roster

The official URL for this operation definition is: 

https://dpc.cms.gov/api/v1/OperationDefinition/dpc-operation-group-remove

Remove members in the provided in the Group resource from the existing membership list.

URL: [base]/Group/[id]/$remove

Parameters

UseNameCardinalityTypeBindingDocumentation
INresource1..1Group

Group of members to remove from existing resource

OUTreturn1..1Group

Updated group resource.

name: Remove Members from Attribution Roster
description: Remove members in the provided in the Group resource from the existing membership list.

parameter.name: resource
parameter.documentation: Group of members to remove from existing resource
